categories.title: Aesthetic
categories.description: The aesthetic category embraces beauty, style, and visual appeal. Items in this category are designed to evoke a particular mood, atmosphere, or emotional response. Whether it's through minimalist elegance, vibrant colors, or soft, pastel tones, aesthetics aim to create a visually pleasing experience. The aesthetic category includes designs that are not just functional, but also enhance the overall sensory experience. From art prints to home decor, fashion accessories to graphic designs, everything within this category carries a unique sense of style and personal expression. It's about capturing moments of beauty, offering inspiration, and creating environments that feel harmonious and thoughtful.

stickers.title: Yellow Tulip Bouquet Sticker
stickers.description:
This sticker features a charming bouquet of three stylized yellow tulips.

The tulips are depicted in a soft, slightly abstract manner, with each petal outlined in a subtle darker shade, giving them a touch of dimension. The main color is a sunny, warm yellow, creating a cheerful and bright image.

The stems are slender and green, tied together with a small, tan-colored binding, suggesting a freshly picked or thoughtfully arranged bouquet. The overall aesthetic is simple and sweet, making it a versatile sticker for various uses.
